alert.note: Alert for Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN FRANKLIN...EASTERN PHELPS...SOUTHWESTERN KEARNEY AND NORTHEASTERN HARLAN COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ragan, or 8 miles southeast of Holdrege, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Holdrege, Axtell, Wilcox, Funk, and Ragan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
